title: tensorflow label_image recognize so slow
body_html:
I already asked this question on stackoverflow but It seems no one knows.

would you mind giving advices to make to code run faster.
Cause It took 5 second on laptop (30 seconds on pi 2) to recognize one picture of letter

(tensorflow)khoa@khoa:~/tensorflow/tf_lv$ time python label_image.py photo1/9_9.jpg 
W tensorflow/core/framework/op_def_util.cc:332] Op BatchNormWithGlobalNormalization is deprecated. It will cease to work in GraphDef version 9. Use tf.nn.batch_normalization().
t

real	0m2.344s
user	0m3.144s
sys	0m0.512s

body:
I already asked [this question](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/40705203/tensorflow-label-image-recognize-so-slow?noredirect=1#comment68687966_40705203) on stackoverflow but It seems no one knows.

would you mind giving advices to make to code run faster.
Cause It took 5 second on laptop (30 seconds on pi 2) to recognize one picture of letter  

```
(tensorflow)khoa@khoa:~/tensorflow/tf_lv$ time python label_image.py photo1/9_9.jpg 
W tensorflow/core/framework/op_def_util.cc:332] Op BatchNormWithGlobalNormalization is deprecated. It will cease to work in GraphDef version 9. Use tf.nn.batch_normalization().
t

real	0m2.344s
user	0m3.144s
sys	0m0.512s
```
